title: CLAUDE.md Layering System
description: Define and document the CLAUDE.md hierarchy: global level (~/.claude/CLAUDE.md), project level (project/CLAUDE.md), and how they interact. Clarify what belongs at each level.

acceptanceCriteria.text: Define what belongs at global level (user preferences, browser choice, commit rules)
Define what belongs at project level (project-specific tooling, paths, patterns)
Create template for each layer with clear sections
Add 'use /prd for PRD work' and 'use /1password for secrets' pointers
